statements: DELETE FROM warranty_info WHERE warranty_provider = 'Company XYZ';
DELETE FROM warranty_info WHERE warranty_provider = 'ABC Warranty' AND warranty_end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM warranty_information WHERE component_id = 101 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vehicle_model WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota' AND year_of_manufacture < 2010;

DELETE FROM vehicle_models WHERE manufacturer = 'Ford' AND year < 2010;
DELETE FROM warranty_provider WHERE provider_location = 'New York';
